item.title: Information about Becoming an Intro Lab TA
item.description: As part of the Intro Lab TA application process, candidates must complete an interview. Visit this page to learn more about the interview process. You can also learn about all the other Undergraduate Course Assistant (UCA) positions in the Department of Computer Science. Why would you want to be a lab TA? It’s rewarding to help people! Yaaay! It’s fun to help people with COS! Yaaay! You get lots and lots and lots of debugging experience!
